REUTERS.UNKNOWN: T f1539 reute r f BC-EC-SUGAR-IMPORT-LEVIE 04-07 0061

TEXT.TITLE: EC SUGAR IMPORT LEVIES
TEXT.BODY: The following import levies for white and raw sugar are effective tomorrow, in European currency units (ecu) per 100 kilos. White sugar, denatured and non-denatured 51.94 versus 51.94 previously. Raw sugar, denatured and non-denatured 44.01 versus 43.73 previously. The rate for raws is based on 92 pct yield. Reuter
